name: Evasive Maneuver
description:
You almost reached your destination when ahead of you appears to be a field of objects blocking your way. You're navigation interface determined that it will take only one minute of extreme evasive maneuver to get past. To make matters worse, your O2 tank suddenly detached and is now moving widely out of control. Luckily, you managed to join together with your O2 tank by linking to it. Can you make it through to the end?

Please download the window build if the browser version is giving you trouble.

How to Play:
W - Move Up
A - Move Left
S - Move Down
D - Move Right
Space bar - Link/unlink from O2 tank.

Team member:
robbossmango89 - Developer
Ugetsuu - Game Art

3rd Party Assets used: Progress Bar

Background Art
